name: Sun Chaser (Survival Platformer)
description:
Game Description:

Race against the sunset as a Sun Chaser! John woke up in the morning to find that his mother has been turned into a flower by the local magician…. and cursed to wither once the sunsets!

  • Follow the last remaining ray of the sun to make sure the flower gets enough sunlight!
  • Vault over trees!
  • Jump over platform gaps!
  • How long can you delay the inevitable setting of the sun?

Tips: The light that shines on platforms will show the sun’s relative position

Control:

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Team: CTG GameCreators

Design: Alex, Max

Programming: Colin, David, Tom

3D Art: Alex

Art Direction and Concept Art: Molly

Coach: Tom Kun
